metadata.title: CVE-2022-24836 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Nokogiri is an open source XML and HTML library for Ruby. Nokogiri `< v1.13.4` contains an inefficient regular expression that is susceptible to excessive backtracking when attempting to detect encoding in HTML documents. Users are advised to upgrade to Nokogiri `>= 1.13.4`. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: ruby-nokogiri package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
